A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had done the mistake of going to the cinema to see the Force Awakens. I didn't fall for that again though! Out of some interest one night I watched The Last Jedi on fast forward online. The movie is a ridiculous charade of mumbo-jumbo!\nI'm only gonna mention 2 scenes. Leia survives outer space without any gear and returns to the spaceship better than Superman would thanks to The Force! Meanwhile Luke is doing ads for fresh milk of a huge-titted alien cow and teaches as how to fish with a 500 meters spear on a scene that was definitely part of the gag reel!\nDraw your own conclusions...!
